cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR. 

The paper focuses on the task of action recognition, which involves combining language and vision. This task is highly relevant to computer vision (cs.CV) and natural language processing (cs.CL). The paper also discusses various approaches and datasets, which are related to machine learning (cs.LG), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), and information retrieval (cs.IR).
